categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: An Imperial outpost was located on the Forest Moon of Endor during the Battle of Endor. After the Galactic Empire was defeated during the battle, Imperial holdouts remained in the outpost in the hopes of launching a counterattack against the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Pathfinders, an Rebel Alliance Special Forces team, assaulted and took control of the base, gaining intelligence about the Empire's post-Endor plans.
